name: Nobophobia
description: Nobophobia is an atmospheric 3D horror, where you have to find a way out of the mysterious labyrinth of rooms and corridors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 1024 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
